channel.title: (Showoff) My newest blade (Showoff) FINISHED
channel.description:
I wont release it because it has too high of a poly count for a runescape client. I believe its 1.5k poly count max for those. This model has too many faces for the client after deleting lines. Tell me what you think, please. Also, any helping naming it? I'm struck out of ideas.
Finished - Alright, it took me a while to get these droplets of bloods correct. I finally finished the blade after completing the rounding of the entire hilt. This is my best sword ever and i am very proud of it. Also, i hope your proud of me for actually finishing a model i started. Instead of moving on to another.
[b]Here is the whole sword.[/b] {V1} [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2v0n85x.png[/img] {Finished} [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28qpvgx.png[/img]
[b]Here is the hilt. {Finished}[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/s4q9fm.png[/img]
[b]DOC Info {finished}[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/295xr3l.png[/img]
Also, any ideas for the next model i can make. I've been getting bored and need something else to do.

item.title: (Showoff) My newest blade (Showoff) FINISHED
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“xcvxcv2, post:16, topic:285121”]whats the double poly count?

it looks awesome btw

i dont like the color of the blade for some reason

but it still looks good

was this a trace, or was this from your thoughts?[/quote]
I’ll be honest, I started thinking i was going to make a new Zamorak symbol. After i played with it and got it that far, i decided it would look cool as a dagger. Then it became a staff. Then it became a sword. This thing really proved to myself that i am improving at modeling. (TBH i thought i was getting nowhere and was about to quit).
[/quote]

Read full topic
